DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate cardio-renal overall safety profile GE 145 320 mg I/ml Injection compare iopamidol 370 mg I/mL . The study focus elderly subject either chronic renal insufficiency , diabetes mellitus ( DM ) require drug therapy , congestive heart failure ( CHF ) NYHA Class III great , refer coronary catheterization procedure without PCI .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study GE-145 320 mg I/mL Injection vs. Iopamidol 370 mg I/mL Elderly Subjects Undergoing Coronary Procedure
DOC.criteria: Males females 65 year age cardiovascular disease refer coronary catheterization procedure without PCI . The subject least one follow comorbidities : 1 ) Chronic renal insufficiency , ( eGFR < 60 15 mL/min/1.73 m2 accord MDRD equation ) measure within 2 week screen visit ; 2 ) DM diagnose great 6 month prior study entry require either insulin antihyperglycemic drug therapy ; 3 ) CHF ( NYHA ) class III great measure within 2 week enrollment screen visit . The subject know allergy either iodine ICM . The subject severe renal insufficiency ( eGFR < 15 mL/min/1.73 m2 accord MDRD equation ) dialysis . The subject acute coronary syndrome require emergency coronary angiography and/or intervention . The subject willing unable discontinue metformin ( e.g. , Glucophage ) time study procedure .
